Actions.Name: HTML to PDF
Actions.Description: Convert HTML code snippet into full featured PDF.

Actions.Name: Merge PDF
Actions.Description: Merge multiple documents into one new single PDF. Supports many file formats. For example, pdf, doc, docx, xls, jpg, png, etc.

Actions.Name: PDF Filler
Actions.Description: Add text, images, signatures to pdf. Fill PDF form fields and create new pdf from templates

Actions.Name: Split PDF
Actions.Description: Splits pages from PDF document into multiple new PDF files using page numbers and page ranges
